scripts.test: tsc && eslint . && npx convex dev --once && npm run testOnly
scripts.testOnly: npx convex run read:runTests && npx convex run write:runTests && npx convex run paginate:runTests && npm run testCascade
scripts.testCascade: npx convex run cascade:setup && sleep 0.2 && npx convex run cascade:runTest
